Name: Training as a technical system planner (aGw*)
Tags: systemplaner muenchen stuttgart deggendorf azubi teil
Beschreibung: With your training as a technical system planner HLSK (aGw*) you will become part of our team from 01.09 and take on a key role within our group of companies. (*all genders welcome)
Aufgaben:
Basic drawing training and creation of CAD plans in 2D/3D
Practice-oriented work through collaboration on projects
Planning the supply of heating, cooling, air and water to buildings together with colleagues
Cross-location processing of exciting, innovative and challenging projects in an international team
Eigenschaften:
You have a good spatial sense
You have a technical understanding and mathematical knowledge
You enjoy working with computers
You are a team player, reliable and have an independent way of working
You have at least a secondary school leaving certificate

Name: Team assistance (aGw*)
Tags: assistenz frankfurt berlin muenchen coburg bamberg deggendorf sofia varna voll
Standort: Frankfurt, Berlin, Munich, Coburg, Bamberg, Deggendorf, Sofia, Varna
Beschreibung: Do you have a talent for organization and like to lend a helping hand to your colleagues? Do you always have an eye on everything, love to coordinate and work with foresight? Then come and join us! As a team assistant (aGw*) you are an integral part of our team and support us in all organizational and administrative tasks.  (*all genders welcome)
Aufgaben:
General administrative activities, such as correspondence, ordering, incoming and outgoing mail
Welcoming and entertaining customers and guests
Taking over the telephone switchboard, organizing meetings and seminars
Organization of team-related tasks
Documentation of meetings and events
Communication in German and English
Eigenschaften:
You have completed commercial training or have relevant professional experience as a team assistant (m/f/d).
You have very good knowledge of MS Office.
You have a talent for organizing and documenting.
You are reliable, motivated and keep an overview even in hectic situations.
You work in a structured and solution-oriented manner.

Name: Specialist planner HLSK (aGw*)
Tags: fachplaner frankfurt berlin muenchen stuttgart coburg bamberg deggendorf sofia varna voll
Standort: Frankfurt, Berlin, Munich, Stuttgart, Coburg, Bamberg, Deggendorf, Sofia, Varna
Beschreibung: As an HVAC specialist planner (aGw*), you will play a key role in the realization of our projects and make a significant contribution to the development of our group of companies. (*all genders welcome)
Aufgaben:
Implementation of challenging and exciting TGA projects across all HOAI service phases
Development of innovative, resource-saving system solutions
Conception, planning, tendering and, if necessary, site supervision of TGA projects
BIM planning with digital twin and 3D modeling
Eigenschaften:
You have a degree, a master craftsman/technician qualification in supply and building services engineering or comparable training.
You feel at home in the field of heating, ventilation, sanitation or air conditioning.
You are motivated by the creation of innovative, resource-saving system solutions.
You are familiar with relevant standards, guidelines and common project management tools such as Revit, Orca or Plancal Nova.
You have an independent way of working and a quick grasp of complex issues
You take initiative and are a team player.

Name: HR Manager (aGw*)
Tags: hr frankfurt berlin muenchen coburg voll teil
Beschreibung: As HR Manager (aGw*) you will provide us with significant support in the procurement and selection of future employees. (*all genders welcome)
Aufgaben:
Advising and supporting employees in all personnel-related matters
Carrying out recruitment processes including job advertisements, applicant management and selection procedures
Responsibility for onboarding new employees and integrating them into the company
Administration and maintenance of personnel files and management of the HR database
Support in conducting employee appraisals and performance reviews
Coordination of training and development measures for employees
Collaboration on HR projects and continuous optimization of HR processes
Ensuring compliance with legal and internal company guidelines in the HR area
Eigenschaften:
Completed commercial training, ideally with further training in human resources or a comparable qualification
Several years of professional experience in HR, preferably in a comparable position
Sound knowledge of employment law and experience in dealing with HR-related issues
Strong communication skills and strong empathy in dealing with employees
Independent, structured way of working and organizational skills
Confident handling of common HR software solutions and MS Office applications
Team orientation and the ability to work successfully in a dynamic environment

Name: HR working student (aGw*)
Tags: hr frankfurt berlin muenchen coburg azubi student teil
Beschreibung: As a working student in HR (aGw*), you will provide us with significant support in the procurement and selection of future employees. (*all genders welcome)
Aufgaben:
Support in the administration and maintenance of personnel files and the HR database
Assistance with the organization and implementation of job interviews and selection procedures
Support in the preparation of onboarding processes for new employees
Assisting with the coordination of training and further education measures
Support in the preparation of employment contracts and other HR-related documents
General administrative activities in the HR department
Eigenschaften:
Enrolled student (m/f/d) of economics or social sciences, ideally with a focus on human resources or a comparable course of study
Initial experience in the field of human resources through internships or study-related activities desirable
Basic knowledge of MS Office, especially Excel and Word
Reliable and careful way of working as well as a high degree of organizational skills
Ability to work in a team, strong communication skills and interest in HR-related topics
Initiative and the ability to quickly familiarize yourself with new topics

Name: Social Media Manager (aGw*)
Tags: marketing frankfurt berlin muenchen coburg voll teil
Beschreibung: As a Social Media Manager (aGw*) you are largely responsible for our content on our online platforms. (*all genders welcome)
Aufgaben:
Development and implementation of a social media strategy to increase brand awareness and reach
Creation of target group-specific content plans and content creation for various platforms (e.g. Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, Twitter)
Planning, implementation and optimization of social media campaigns to support marketing goals
Monitoring and analyzing the performance of all social media activities using suitable tools
Community management: active interaction with the target group, answering user queries and maintaining the online community
Identification and implementation of trends and innovations in the social media sector
Collaboration with internal and external stakeholders, including agencies and influencers
Continuous further development of the social media strategy based on the insights and data gained
Eigenschaften:
Degree in marketing, communication or comparable qualifications
Proven professional experience in social media management, ideally in a similar position or through relevant internships
Excellent knowledge of common social media platforms, tools and trends
Creativity and a good feel for appealing content formats and storytelling
Analytical skills to interpret data and derive recommendations for action
Strong communication and teamwork skills as well as an independent, structured way of working
Fluent German and good written and spoken English skills

Name: Working Student Online Marketing (aGw*)
Tags: arketing frankfurt berlin muenchen coburg student azubi teil
Beschreibung: As a Working Student Online Marketing (aGw*) you will be largely responsible for our content on our online platforms. (*all genders welcome)
Aufgaben:
Support in the creation and optimization of online marketing campaigns (e.g. Google Ads, social media ads)
Assisting with content creation for various online channels (e.g. website, social media, newsletter)
Analysis of campaign and website data to derive optimization measures
Support with search engine optimization (SEO) through keyword research and on-page optimization
Maintaining and updating content on the company website and other digital channels
Researching current trends and developments in the online marketing sector
Collaboration on projects to increase the online presence and reach of the BAE GROUP
Eigenschaften:
Enrollment at a university in a relevant degree program such as marketing, media studies, communication or similar.
First practical experience in the field of online marketing through internships, working student activities or own commitment
Basic understanding of digital marketing tools and channels, e.g. Google Analytics, Facebook Ads Manager
Good knowledge of MS Office, especially Excel and PowerPoint
Analytical skills and a structured, independent way of working
Creativity, ability to work in a team and a good feel for digital trends and developments
Good written and spoken German and English skills
